fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, a random non-Everfrost player who isn't the target of the Everfrost's factional roleblock will be roleblocked.
- Roleblock immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player each night. If they would die tonight, their role and will will be hidden from the town and shown as "Frozen".
**Blaze of Frost** â€” Roleblock a non-Everfrost player at random, then do that again, then coldsnap. You may only use this ability once each game.
